rule:

tags in the output.
input: Empathy connects humanity. Compassion breeds kindness. Generosity enriches spirit.
validityText:
The input consists of a paragraph of text containing three sentences: "Empathy connects humanity.", "Compassion breeds kindness.", and "Generosity enriches spirit.". This meets the requirement of containing at least three separate sentences. The input includes a combination of letters and punctuation, complying with the specification that allows any combination of letters, numbers, symbols, and punctuation. The input also contains actual characters and is not solely composed of whitespace characters. 

Based on the evaluation of these points against the input specification, the input meets all the requirements set forth.

OK
